General.Name: Indowind Energy Limited
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Indowind Energy Limited operates as an IPP in the renewable energy sector in India. It engages in developing, setting up, operating, and maintaining wind farms. It also provides project management and asset management services, as well as trades in and sells carbon credits (CERs) in Indian and international CER markets. Indowind Energy Limited was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Chennai, India.

1.Name: Mr. Neelamegam Krishnamoorthy Haribabu
1.Title: CFO, Director of Fin. & Whole Time Director
